SEARCH
Module io.jstach.rainbowgum
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum

Interface RainbowGum

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, LogEventLogger
public sealed interface RainbowGum extends AutoCloseable, LogEventLogger
The main entry point and configuration of RainbowGum logging.

RainbowGum logging loads configuration through the service loader. While you can manually set RainbowGum using set(Supplier) it is better to register implementations through the ServiceLoader so that RainbowGum will load prior to any external logging.

To register a custom RainbowGum: 


class RainbowGumProviderExample implements RainbowGumProvider {

	@Override
	public Optional<RainbowGum> provide(LogConfig config) {

		Property<Integer> bufferSize = Property.builder() //
			.ofInt()
			.orElse(1024)
			.build("logging.custom.async.bufferSize");

		LogProvider<LogOutput> output = Property.builder()
			.ofProvider(LogOutput::of)
			.orElse(LogOutput.ofStandardOut())
			.withKey("logging.custom.output")
			.provider(o -> o);

		var gum = RainbowGum.builder() //
			.route(r -> {
				r.publisher(PublisherFactory //
					.async() //
					.bufferSize(r.value(bufferSize)) //
					.build());
				r.appender("console", a -> {
					a.output(output);
				});
				r.level(Level.INFO);
			})
			.build();

		return Optional.of(gum);
	}

}

  • Method Details

    • of

      static RainbowGum of()
      Gets the currently statically bound RainbowGum and will try to load and find one if there is none currently bound. This is a blocking operation as in locks are used and will block indefinitely till a gum has loaded. If that is not desired see getOrNull().
      Returns:
      current RainbowGum or new loaded one.

    • getOrNull

      static @Nullable RainbowGum getOrNull()
      Gets the currently statically bound RainbowGum or null if none are finished binding. Unlike of() this will never load or start an instance but rather just gets the currently bound one. It will also never block and does not wait if one is currently being loaded.
      Returns:
      current RainbowGum or null

    • defaults

      static RainbowGum defaults()
      Provides the service loader default based RainbowGum.
      Returns:
      RainbowGum.

    • set

      static void set(Supplier<RainbowGum> supplier)
      Sets the global default RainbowGum. The supplied RainbowGum must not already be started.
      Parameters:
      supplier - the supplier will be memoized when accessed and start() will be called.

    • config

      LogConfig config()
      The config associated with this instance.
      Returns:
      config.

    • router

      LogRouter.RootRouter router()
      The router that will route log messages to publishers.
      Returns:
      router

    • start

      default RainbowGum start()
      Starts the rainbow gum and returns it. It is returned for try-with usage convenience.
      Returns:
      the started RainbowGum.

    • instanceId

      UUID instanceId()
      Unique id of rainbow gum instance.
      Returns:
      random id created on creation.

    • close

      void close()
      Will close the RainbowGum and all registered components as well as removed from the shutdown hooks. If the rainbow gum is set as global it will no longer be global and replaced with the bootstrapping in memory queue.
      Specified by:
      close in interface AutoCloseable

    • log

      default void log(LogEvent event)
      This append call is mainly for testing as it does not avoid making events that do not need to be made if no logging needs to be done. Logs events usually without filtering. There is no guarantee this call will check if the event should be filtered (threshold is too low) and in general does not on purpose!
      Specified by:
      log in interface LogEventLogger
      Parameters:
      event - event.

      builder.
